properties.description:
Source filet ei tunnistu csv muotoisina. --> source datasetin asetuksista Schema v채lilehti ja ratkesi.
Select 9 Alue-kent채n mappaus putoaaa v채lill채.
Sink 4-5 vain testausta varten.

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Taloustoimi as string,
		Alue as string,
		Tiedot as string,
		{2000} as decimal(10,0),
		{2001} as string,
		{2002} as string,
		{2003} as string,
		{2004} as string,
		{2005} as string,
		{2006} as string,
		{2007} as string,
		{2008} as string,
		{2009} as string,
		{2010} as string,
		{2011} as string,
		{2012} as string,
		{2013} as string,
		{2014} as string,
		{2015} as string,
		{2016} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> source2
source(output(
		Taloustoimi as string,
		Alue as string,
		Tiedot as string,
		{2000} as string,
		{2001} as string,
		{2002} as string,
		{2003} as string,
		{2004} as string,
		{2005} as string,
		{2006} as string,
		{2007} as string,
		{2008} as string,
		{2009} as string,
		{2010} as string,
		{2011} as string,
		{2012} as string,
		{2013} as string,
		{2014} as string,
		{2015} as string,
		{2016} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100) ~> source3
source(output(
		Taloustoimi as string,
		Alue as string,
		Tiedot as string,
		{2000} as string,
		{2001} as string,
		{2002} as string,
		{2003} as string,
		{2004} as string,
		{2005} as string,
		{2006} as string,
		{2007} as string,
		{2008} as string,
		{2009} as string,
		{2010} as string,
		{2011} as string,
		{2012} as string,
		{2013} as string,
		{2014} as string,
		{2015} as string,
		{2016} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source4
source4 filter(Taloustoimi == 'B1GMHT Bruttokansantuote') ~> Filter1
source2 filter(Taloustoimi == 'E1_1H Tyolliset, henkea') ~> Filter2
source3 filter(Taloustoimi == 'KVAKI Keskivakiluku (henkea)') ~> Filter3
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		Alue,
		BKT_2000 = {2000},
		BKT_2001 = {2001},
		BKT_2002 = {2002},
		BKT_2003 = {2003},
		BKT_2004 = {2004},
		BKT_2005 = {2005},
		BKT_2006 = {2006},
		BKT_2007 = {2007},
		BKT_2008 = {2008},
		BKT_2009 = {2009},
		BKT_2010 = {2010},
		BKT_2011 = {2011},
		BKT_2012 = {2012},
		BKT_2013 = {2013},
		BKT_2014 = {2014},
		BKT_2015 = {2015},
		BKT_2016 = {2016}
	)) ~> Select6
Filter2 select(mapColumn(
		Alue,
		Tyolliset_2000 = {2000},
		Tyolliset_2001 = {2001},
		Tyolliset_2002 = {2002},
		Tyolliset_2003 = {2003},
		Tyolliset_2004 = {2004},
		Tyolliset_2005 = {2005},
		Tyolliset_2006 = {2006},
		Tyolliset_2007 = {2007},
		Tyolliset_2008 = {2008},
		Tyolliset_2009 = {2009},
		Tyolliset_2010 = {2010},
		Tyolliset_2011 = {2011},
		Tyolliset_2012 = {2012},
		Tyolliset_2013 = {2013},
		Tyolliset_2014 = {2014},
		Tyolliset_2015 = {2015},
		Tyolliset_2016 = {2016}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select7
Select6, Select7 join(Select6@Alue == Select7@Alue,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Filter3 select(mapColumn(
		Alue,
		Vakiluku_2000 = {2000},
		Vakiluku_2001 = {2001},
		Vakiluku_2002 = {2002},
		Vakiluku_2003 = {2003},
		Vakiluku_2004 = {2004},
		Vakiluku_2005 = {2005},
		Vakiluku_2006 = {2006},
		Vakiluku_2007 = {2007},
		Vakiluku_2008 = {2008},
		Vakiluku_2009 = {2009},
		Vakiluku_2010 = {2010},
		Vakiluku_2011 = {2011},
		Vakiluku_2012 = {2012},
		Vakiluku_2013 = {2013},
		Vakiluku_2014 = {2014},
		Vakiluku_2015 = {2015},
		Vakiluku_2016 = {2016}
	)) ~> Select8
Join1, Select8 join(Select6@Alue == Select8@Alue,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join2
Join2 select(mapColumn(
		Alue = Select6@Alue,
		BKT_2000,
		BKT_2001,
		BKT_2002,
		BKT_2003,
		BKT_2004,
		BKT_2005,
		BKT_2006,
		BKT_2007,
		BKT_2008,
		BKT_2009,
		BKT_2010,
		BKT_2011,
		BKT_2012,
		BKT_2013,
		BKT_2014,
		BKT_2015,
		BKT_2016,
		Tyolliset_2000,
		Tyolliset_2001,
		Tyolliset_2002,
		Tyolliset_2003,
		Tyolliset_2004,
		Tyolliset_2005,
		Tyolliset_2006,
		Tyolliset_2007,
		Tyolliset_2008,
		Tyolliset_2009,
		Tyolliset_2010,
		Tyolliset_2011,
		Tyolliset_2012,
		Tyolliset_2013,
		Tyolliset_2014,
		Tyolliset_2015,
		Tyolliset_2016,
		Vakiluku_2000,
		Vakiluku_2001,
		Vakiluku_2002,
		Vakiluku_2003,
		Vakiluku_2004,
		Vakiluku_2005,
		Vakiluku_2006,
		Vakiluku_2007,
		Vakiluku_2008,
		Vakiluku_2009,
		Vakiluku_2010,
		Vakiluku_2011,
		Vakiluku_2012,
		Vakiluku_2013,
		Vakiluku_2014,
		Vakiluku_2015,
		Vakiluku_2016
	)) ~> Select9
Select9 sink(input(
		Alue as string,
		BKT_2000 as decimal(20,2),
		BKT_2001 as decimal(20,2),
		BKT_2002 as decimal(20,2),
		BKT_2003 as decimal(20,2),
		BKT_2004 as decimal(20,2),

		BKT_2013 as decimal(20,2),

		Tyolliset_2002 as decimal(20,2),

		Tyolliset_2004 as decimal(20,2),
		Tyolliset_2005 as decimal(20,2),
		Tyolliset_2006 as decimal(20,2),
		Tyolliset_2007 as decimal(20,2),
		Tyolliset_2008 as decimal(20,2),
		Tyolliset_2009 as decimal(20,2),
		Tyolliset_2010 as decimal(20,2),
		Tyolliset_2011 as decimal(20,2),
		Tyolliset_2012 as decimal(20,2),
		Tyolliset_2013 as decimal(20,2),
		Tyolliset_2014 as decimal(20,2),
		Tyolliset_2015 as decimal(20,2),
		Tyolliset_2016 as decimal(20,2),
		Vakiluku_2000 as decimal(20,2),
		Vakiluku_2001 as decimal(20,2),
		Vakiluku_2002 as decimal(20,2),
		Vakiluku_2003 as decimal(20,2),
		Vakiluku_2004 as decimal(20,2),
		Vakiluku_2005 as decimal(20,2),
		Vakiluku_2006 as decimal(20,2),
		Vakiluku_2007 as decimal(20,2),
		Vakiluku_2008 as decimal(20,2),
		Vakiluku_2009 as decimal(20,2),

	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true) ~> sink2

		Alue as string,
		Vakiluku_2000 as decimal(20,2),
